name: Loopdaloop
tagline: The best Chrome App Synthesizer on the planet!
body:
### Loopdaloop - on any desktop platform!
Loopdaloop works on Windows, Mac, Linux and ChromeOS - take your pick!

Multiple oscillators, filters, time varying parameter control, synthesizer setup visualization, and a mouse, keyboard and touch piano keyboard are all available in the development version.

The release version is available on the [Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/loopdaloop/clhambhgmoihmhbfjmmaciggnfcfkflo). It is regularly updated automatically, so make sure you use it regularly to enjoy the latest goodness! 

### Designer Templates
Loopdaloop is an open source project, developed by [a software engineer](https://plus.google.com/110940258418984837125) as a therapeutic break from his day job. It's built with the HTML5 WebAudio API, which is pretty cool and does all the heavy lifting.

Right now it is a competent synthesizer. One day it will also support sound fonts and looping.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
